content:
Turn On Service AI Grounding

To get started, turn on grounding. After you enable Service AI Grounding, you can define the knowledge and case fields you want Einstein to ground on.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Service AI Grounding, and then select Service AI Grounding.
Turn on Service AI Grounding.

Next, select the Knowledge or Case fields you want to use for grounding. When you ground with Knowledge, Einstein uses information from your knowledge articles to draft responses customized to your unique knowledge base. When you ground with Cases, Einstein uses the unique case details to draft personalized responses.

Ground with Knowledge
Ground with Cases
title: Enabling AI Grounding in Service Cloud
